title: Wall Street Breakfast, April 13th: Banking Earnings On Tap, China Reports A Trade Deficit
author: Seeking Alpha

description: Today’s top stories: Banking earnings are set to provide a welcome boost to the S&P 500; China sees its first trade deficit in over a year; and President Trump is investigating Amazon over US Post Office losses. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
